item.title: servo motor (Ex72xx)
item.description: Lab test stage (1mm/rev) Motor : AM8111-0F20 Scalings Config for scaling in mm, mm/s, mm/s2 Motor AM8111-XFX0 Data about the motor can be found here: https://infosys.beckhoff.com/english.php?content=../content/1033/am8100/index.html&id= Important for scaling factors in axis.yaml is the motor pole count. For the AM8111-XFX0 motor the pole count is 6. Encoder scaling Only the encoder integrated encoder is configured in this example. The specification of the encoder for a AM8111-0F20 motor: One Cable Technology for power and feedback: feedback transmission via motor cable, no feedback cable necessary, electronic nameplate, multi-turn, absolute position within 4096 revolutions, 18 bit resolution.
